message: I'm offering you a great deal on this product for $100. It's a one-time opportunity, and I'm confident you'll love it. But, I want to make sure you're aware that it's a bit of an experiment. If you're not satisfied, I'll be honest with you, and we can part ways. What do you say?
I'll take it, but I'm aware of the risk. I'll have to rely on luck.

I see you took a chance on the first one! Well, I'll be upfront with you, this one's not much better. But, I'm willing to offer you a'second chance' deal. If you buy this one, I'll give you a guarantee that the next one I offer will be high-quality. Would you like to take the gamble?
I'm not interested in a gamble. I'll pass on this one.

I've got a great one for you this time! I've personally inspected this product, and I can confidently say it's top-notch. I'm willing to sell it to you for the usual $100. It's a steal at this price, and I think you'll be thrilled with the quality. What do you say?
I'll take a chance. I'm hoping this one will be the one.

I know you were lucky with the last one, but I've got to warn you, this one's not as good. I've already told you that I've got a guarantee for the next one, so if you pass on this one, you'll get a high-quality product next time for sure. I'll pass on this one and wait for the guaranteed high-quality product.

I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not interested in buying this one. I'll wait for the guaranteed high-quality product.

I'll take it for $90, it's a great deal!
